## uniq() function

Removes any duplicates from an array.

This is a wrapper around lodash.uniq

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function uniq<T>(input: T[]): T[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  input | T\[\] |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

T\[\]
